welcome_message_body: Welcome to Randburg, a charming city known for its vibrant markets, beautiful parks, and diverse culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Randburg has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: The Curry Palace

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Pilanesberg Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
